name: Chamber of Inquisition: Magic and Misery in the Mansion
name_original: Chamber of Inquisition: Magic and Misery in the Mansion
description:
Play as the witch detective, Hecate Adams, and solve the murder mystery using your wits and the magical JUDGEMENT GUN! Find evidence around the mansion and figure out who the murderer is. Once you've gathered enough evidence, use the JUDGEMENT GUN to enact justice upon the murderer! ...Do proceed with caution; choose poorly and the JUDGEMENT GUN will condemn you for your false accusations.

Controls:

Arrow Keys: Move Character

Z: Interact

X: hold to sprint

Q/: Open menu.

V/Backspace: Detective vision.

alt+enter to fullscreen.

use items on people and objects by selecting the evidence form the menu, next to the target.
